colors.palette_notes: Natural palette: Deep Forest Green for trust, Sky Blue for weather/water, Soil Brown/Terracotta for accents. Avoid neon greens. Use matte finishes.

typography.rules: Headings must use Manrope. Body uses Inter. No generic 'sans-serif' fallback without a primary font.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'SaaS Blue' (#3B82F6) as primary. Use the defined Forest Green.
DO NOT use gradients for text. Keep it legible.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 48x48px for accessibility in the field.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. If not available, use a strong sans-serif.
Dark mode should be 'Deep Loam' (#0C0A09), not pure black.
All interactive elements must have a :focus-visible state for keyboard navigation.
Images must have alt text for accessibility.
All key elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Smart Farmer Portal. Prioritize clarity, large touch targets, and high contrast. The UI should feel 'organic' but 'modern'. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Disease Detection' page has a clear upload area and displays the example images as 'Recent Scans' or 'Common Diseases'. Use the 'Organic & Earthy' color palette strictly.
